Detailed Description

a GUIDO voice with list(s) for events and tags

lgVoice includes no curEvent, curTag pointers for memory saving reasons! if a lgSeqeunce includes a large number of chords which then inlcude lgVoice data the memory size would be unneccessary blown up.
